title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on back: J. Lospinuso Age 9
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Brick repeat of circus scene with elephants, fat woman with an umbrella, people in grand stand, and tight rope walker. Printed in rose, grey, and navy blue (grey over rose for light purple).
